detectors.description:

detectors.description:
owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#80-82)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#89-92)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#94-98)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#190-196)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#198-204)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#206-216)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#218-224)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#226-239)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#241-248)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#250-258)

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BananaFarm.decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol#260-272)
private constant DECIMALS = 9; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol)#120
private constant MAX_UINT256 = ~uint256(0); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol)#121
private constant INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY = 1000000 * 10**DECIMALS; (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol)#122
private constant TOTAL_GONS = MAX_UINT256 - (MAX_UINT256 % INITIAL_FRAGMENTS_SUPPLY); (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol)#124
private constant MAX_SUPPLY = ~uint128(0);  // (2^128) - 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BananaFarm.sol)#126
